template.name: Random Albums From a Virtual Library
template.description: Plays all(!) tracks from an album if at least one or, alternatively, all tracks from the album are part of the selected virtual library.

parameter.name: Playlist name
parameter.placeholdervalue: Enter a name for your dynamic playlist

parameter.name: Only include albums if
parameter.data: 1=the selected virtual library contains at least one album track,2=all album tracks are part of the selected virtual library

parameter.name: Never stop
parameter.tooltipvalue: When all matching tracks have been played, the history and cache are deleted so that these tracks can be played again. You will end up with a dynamic playlist that will not stop playing as long as tracks are found that match the search criteria.

parameter.name: Number of albums from which to get new tracks per batch
Album sort order
parameter.data: 1=Most played first (avg. count),2=Least played first (avg. count),3=Most played first (total count),4=Least played first (total count)
